title: kErala bhuthala
sahitya:
kErala bhUta pAla krpAshIla pAhi mAm mOhinIbAla shrtalOla

anupallavi

 nIrada rucibhara mahiSI madahara vIra shabarIshvara mangalAkAra

caraNam

 mAdhava sharva tanaya nirAmaya mAyAmaya nata kOla puNyOdaya 
bhUdharAgAra bhUvanatrayAdhAra bhUtEshvara vana tulasIdaladhara
